Blacksmith Karrod: Recently I ordered a large amount of Oriharukon Ore from the Dwarven Blacksmiths of Giran. Tetrarch Thifiell has commissioned me to make Oriharukon blades. But I am having difficulties, since I am not skilled in working with this material. This precious metal is particularly difficult in all steps of manufacturing, even from its Augmentation stage. If only Steelbender were here now, I would be able to ask him ...
